text: Instead, the kings will remain in London and wait to hear the conference's proposals. Then their views will be transmitted back. MR.BUTLER, the Home Secretary, has decided to meet head-on the biggest challenge to Government authority yet presented by the "Ban-the-Bomb" demonstrators. Police leave has been cancelled and secret plans prepared to deal with the mass sit-down rally planned for Sunday in Parliament-square by the Committee of 100, the anti-nuclear arms group.
handwritten_text: Instead, the kings will remain in London and wait to hear the conference's proposals. Then their views will be transmitted back. MR.BUTLER, the Home Secretary, has decided to meet head-on the biggest challenge to Government authority yet presented by the "Ban-the-Bomb" demonstrators. Police leave has been cancelled and secret plans prepared to deal with the mass sit-down rally planned for Sunday in Parliament-square by the Committee of 100, the anti-nuclear arms group.
